name: py-ujson
description: Ultra fast JSON decoder and encoder written in C with Python bindings.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependent_to.name: py-mikado
dependent_to.description:
Mikado is a lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate
the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data * and to select
the best models in each locus.

dependent_to.name: py-llnl-sina
dependent_to.description:
Sina allows codes to store, query, and visualize their data through an
easy-to-use Python API. Data that fits its recognized schema can be
ingested into one or more supported backends. Sina's API is independent
of backend and gives users the benefits of a database without requiring
knowledge of one, allowing queries to be expressed in pure Python.
Visualizations are also provided through Python. Sina is intended
especially for use with run metadata, allowing users to easily and
efficiently find simulation runs that match some criteria.

dependent_to.name: py-sanic
dependent_to.description:
Sanic is a Flask-like Python 3.5+ web server that is written to go fast.
It is based on the work done by the amazing folks at magicstack
